attributes.action: Make it easier to get a driving test booked and stop scalpers
attributes.additional_details: No one should be making profit off of driving tests in such a greedy way considering DVSA is a government institution. Driving is almost essential to living in the UK nowadays so driving tests shouldn’t be so impossible to book.
attributes.background: Change the current system of booking a driving exam to one thats harder for scalpers to abuse. Its impossible to get an exam unless you pay for a third party website to find one for you and this shouldn’t be the case.

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Pass a law which bans the reselling of practical driving tests 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734043
